Enemon

I recently collaborated in creating an Instagram marketing strategy for this lifestyle and fitness brand. This strategy included original posts, stories, hashtag analysis, and organic engagement that has since allowed the brand to grow.

Institute of Code

I collaborated on Instagram, Facebook, and Pinterest marketing strategies and implemented SEO on Pinterest and our online blog. I scheduled for content to be posted regularly and have, as a result, become proficient and comfortable using scheduling and analytics tools

Sam is Fierce

I formerly collaborated with Instagram influencer Sam is Fierce doing daily organic engagement, posting original photographs, creating unique captions that captured Sam's personality, and implemented hashtags and tags that would increase her reach. I also helped with collaborations with retail, accomodations, and travel companies
